body_html:
Seemingly, NVCC shouldn't be used for gcuda.cc?
[91%] Building CXX object CMakeFiles/tf_stream_executor.dir/home/ubuntu/workspace/tensorflow/tensorflow/stream_executor/gcuda.cc.o
/usr/bin/c++
-DEIGEN_AVOID_STL_ARRAY
-DEIGEN_HAS_C99_MATH
-DLANG_CXX11
-DTENSORFLOW_USE_EIGEN_THREADPOOL
-D__NVCC__
-I/home/ubuntu/workspace/tensorflow
-I/home/ubuntu/workspace/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/build2
-I/home/ubuntu/workspace/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/build2/external/zlib_archive
-I/home/ubuntu/workspace/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/build2/external/gif_archive/giflib-5.1.4
-I/home/ubuntu/workspace/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/build2/external/png_archive
-I/home/ubuntu/workspace/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/build2/external/jpeg_archive
-I/home/ubuntu/workspace/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/build2/external/eigen_archive
-I/home/ubuntu/workspace/tensorflow/third_party/eigen3
-I/home/ubuntu/workspace/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/build2/gemmlowp/src/gemmlowp
-I/home/ubuntu/workspace/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/build2/jsoncpp/src/jsoncpp
-I/home/ubuntu/workspace/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/build2/external/farmhash_archive
-I/home/ubuntu/workspace/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/build2/external/farmhash_archive/util
-I/home/ubuntu/workspace/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/build2/external/highwayhash
-I/home/ubuntu/workspace/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/build2/protobuf/src/protobuf/src
-I/home/ubuntu/workspace/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/build2/grpc/src/grpc/include
-I/usr/local/cuda
-I/usr/local/cuda/extras/CUPTI/include
-I/usr/local/cuda/include
-I/home/ubuntu/workspace/tensorflow/third_party/gpus
-fno-exceptions
-std=c++11 -fPIC
-o CMakeFiles/tf_stream_executor.dir/home/ubuntu/workspace/tensorflow/tensorflow/stream_executor/gcuda.cc.o
-c /home/ubuntu/workspace/tensorflow/tensorflow/stream_executor/gcuda.cc

body:
Seemingly, **NVCC** shouldn't be used  for gcuda.cc? 
[91%] Building CXX object CMakeFiles/tf_stream_executor.dir/home/ubuntu/workspace/tensorflow/tensorflow/stream_executor/gcuda.cc.o
/usr/bin/c++  
-DEIGEN_AVOID_STL_ARRAY 
-DEIGEN_HAS_C99_MATH 
-DLANG_CXX11 
-DTENSORFLOW_USE_EIGEN_THREADPOOL 
-D__NVCC__ 
-I/home/ubuntu/workspace/tensorflow 
-I/home/ubuntu/workspace/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/build2 
-I/home/ubuntu/workspace/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/build2/external/zlib_archive 
-I/home/ubuntu/workspace/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/build2/external/gif_archive/giflib-5.1.4 
-I/home/ubuntu/workspace/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/build2/external/png_archive 
-I/home/ubuntu/workspace/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/build2/external/jpeg_archive 
-I/home/ubuntu/workspace/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/build2/external/eigen_archive 
-I/home/ubuntu/workspace/tensorflow/third_party/eigen3 
-I/home/ubuntu/workspace/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/build2/gemmlowp/src/gemmlowp 
-I/home/ubuntu/workspace/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/build2/jsoncpp/src/jsoncpp 
-I/home/ubuntu/workspace/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/build2/external/farmhash_archive 
-I/home/ubuntu/workspace/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/build2/external/farmhash_archive/util 
-I/home/ubuntu/workspace/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/build2/external/highwayhash 
-I/home/ubuntu/workspace/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/build2/protobuf/src/protobuf/src 
-I/home/ubuntu/workspace/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/build2/grpc/src/grpc/include 
-I/usr/local/cuda 
-I/usr/local/cuda/extras/CUPTI/include 
-I/usr/local/cuda/include 
-I/home/ubuntu/workspace/tensorflow/third_party/gpus  
-fno-exceptions 
-std=c++11 -fPIC  
-o CMakeFiles/tf_stream_executor.dir/home/ubuntu/workspace/tensorflow/tensorflow/stream_executor/gcuda.cc.o 
-c /home/ubuntu/workspace/tensorflow/tensorflow/stream_executor/gcuda.cc
